verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> in the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> on the first<WH259> of the second<WH8145> month, in the second<WH8145> year<WH8141> after they had come<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> saying,<WH559>

"Take<WH5375> a census<WH7218> of all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> every<WH3605> male,<WH2145> head<WH1538> by head<WH1538>

from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [is able to] go<WH3318> out to war<WH6635> in Israel,<WH3478> you and Aaron<WH175> shall number<WH6485> them by their armies.<WH6635>
"With you, moreover, there shall be a man<WH376> of each<WH376> tribe,<WH4294> each<WH376> one<WH376> head<WH7218> of his father's household.<WH1004>
"These<WH428> then are the names<WH8034> of the men<WH376> who<WH834> shall stand<WH5975> with you: of Reuben,<WH7205> Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur;<WH7707>
of Simeon,<WH8095> Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai;<WH6701>
of Judah,<WH3063> Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab;<WH5992>
of Issachar,<WH3485> Nethanel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar;<WH6686>
of Zebulun,<WH2074> Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon;<WH2497>
of the sons<WH1121> of Joseph:<WH3130> of Ephraim,<WH669> Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud;<WH5989> of Manasseh,<WH4519> Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur;<WH6301>
of Benjamin,<WH1144> Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni;<WH1441>
of Dan,<WH1835> Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai;<WH5996>
of Asher,<WH836> Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ochran;<WH5918>
of Gad,<WH1410> Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Deuel;<WH1845>
of Naphtali,<WH5321> Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan.<WH5881>

"These<WH428> are they who<WH7148> were called<WH7148> of the congregation,<WH5712> the leaders<WH5387> of their fathers' tribes;<WH4294> they were the heads<WH7218> of divisions<WH505> of Israel.<WH3478>"
So Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> took<WH3947> these<WH428> men<WH376> who<WH834> had been designated<WH9344> by name,<WH8034>

and they assembled<WH6950> all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> together on the first<WH259> of the second<WH8145> month.<WH2320> Then they registered<WH3205> by ancestry<WH3205> in their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> head<WH1538> by head,<WH1538>
just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872> So he numbered<WH6485> them in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai.<WH5514>

Now the sons<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> Israel's first-born, their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> head<WH1538> by head,<WH1538> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Reuben,<WH7205> [were] 46500.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Simeon,<WH8095> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> their numbered<WH6485> men, according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> head<WH1538> by head,<WH1538> every<WH3605> male<WH2145> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Simeon,<WH8095> [were] 59300.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Gad,<WH1410> [were] 45650.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah,<WH3063> [were] 74600.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Issachar,<WH3485> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar,<WH3485> [were] 54400.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Zebulun,<WH2074> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun,<WH2074> [were] 57400.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> [namely,] of the sons<WH1121> of Ephraim,<WH669> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Ephraim,<WH669> [were] 40500.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh,<WH4519> [were] 32200.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin,<WH1144> [were] 35400.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Dan,<WH1835> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan,<WH1835> [were] 62700.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Asher,<WH836> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Asher,<WH836> [were] 41500.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Naphtali,<WH5321> their genealogical<WH8435> registration<WH8435> by their families,<WH4940> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> according to the number<WH4557> of names,<WH8034> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war,<WH6635>
their numbered<WH6485> men, of the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali,<WH5321> [were] 53400.

These<WH428> are the ones who were numbered,<WH6485> whom<WH834> Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> numbered,<WH6485> with the leaders<WH5387> of Israel,<WH3478> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> men,<WH376> each<WH376> of whom<WH259> was of his father's household.<WH1004>

So all<WH3605> the numbered<WH6485> men of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> by their fathers' households,<WH1004> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> whoever<WH3605> [was able to] go<WH3318> out to war<WH6635> in Israel,<WH3478>
even all<WH3605> the numbered<WH6485> men were 603550.
The Levites,<WH3881> however, were not numbered<WH6485> among<WH8432> them by their fathers' tribe.<WH4294>
For the Lord<WH3068> had spoken<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Only<WH389> the tribe<WH4294> of Levi<WH3878> you shall not number,<WH6485> nor<WH3808> shall you take<WH5375> their census<WH7218> among<WH8432> the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

"But you shall appoint<WH6485> the Levites<WH3881> over<WH5921> the tabernacle<WH4908> of the testimony,<WH5715> and over<WH5921> all<WH3605> its furnishings<WH3627> and over<WH5921> all<WH3605> that belongs to it. They shall carry<WH5375> the tabernacle<WH4908> and all<WH3605> its furnishings,<WH3627> and they shall take<WH8334> care<WH8334> of it; they shall also camp<WH2583> around<WH5439> the tabernacle.<WH4908>

"So when the tabernacle<WH4908> is to set<WH5265> out, the Levites<WH3881> shall take<WH3381> it down;<WH3381> and when the tabernacle<WH4908> encamps,<WH2583> the Levites<WH3881> shall set<WH6965> it up. But the layman<WH2114> who comes<WH7131> near<WH7131> shall be put<WH4191> to death.<WH4191>
"And the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall camp,<WH2583> each<WH376> man<WH376> by his own camp,<WH4264> and each<WH376> man<WH376> by his own standard,<WH1714> according to their armies.<WH6635>

"But the Levites<WH3881> shall camp<WH2583> around<WH5439> the tabernacle<WH4908> of the testimony,<WH5715> that there may be no<WH3808> wrath<WH7110> on the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> So the Levites<WH3881> shall keep<WH8104> charge<WH4931> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of the testimony.<WH5715>"
Thus the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did;<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> they did.<WH6213>
